5001.name: The Road to Greystone
5001.description:
A well-maintained road leads toward the imposing silhouette of
Greystone Castle. The fortress sits atop a hill, its grey stone
walls and towers dark against the sky. Pennants snap in the wind
from the battlements. The castle gates lie to the north.

5002.name: The Castle Gates
5002.description:
Massive iron-bound gates stand before you, flanked by towers
bristling with arrow slits. Guards in royal livery challenge all
who approach. Beyond the gates, you can see the cobblestone 
courtyard of Greystone Castle.

5003.name: Castle Courtyard
5003.description:
The courtyard of Greystone Castle bustles with activity. Servants
hurry about their duties, soldiers drill in formation, and nobles
converse in small groups. The main keep rises to the north, while
stables and workshops line the walls.

5004.name: The Great Hall
5004.description:
You stand in the magnificent Great Hall of Greystone Castle.
Tapestries depicting ancient battles hang from the walls. A long
table runs the length of the hall, and at the far end, on a raised
dais, sits the throne of the King. Suits of armor stand at attention.

5010.name: The Castle Armory
5010.description:
Racks of weapons and armor fill this room. Swords, spears, 
shields, and suits of plate mail are arranged in orderly rows.
The royal armorer works at a forge in the corner, maintaining
the kingdom's arsenal.

5020.name: The Royal Stables
5020.description:
The smell of hay and horses fills the air. Fine warhorses
stamp and snort in their stalls, tended by stable hands. The
royal carriages are housed here as well, gleaming with gilt.

5030.name: The Tower Chamber
5030.description:
A spiral staircase has brought you to a chamber high in the
castle tower. Windows provide a commanding view of the kingdom.
A massive iron chest sits against one wall, and ancient tomes
line the shelves. This is where the King keeps his treasures.

5001.name: a castle guard
5001.long_desc: A guard in royal livery stands at attention.

5002.name: a castle servant
5002.long_desc: A servant hurries about their duties.

5003.name: King Valdric
5003.long_desc: King Valdric sits upon his throne, crown gleaming.

5004.name: the royal armorer
5004.long_desc: A muscular smith works the forge, crafting fine weapons.

50.name: a royal longsword
50.room_desc: A finely crafted longsword lies here.

51.name: a kite shield
51.room_desc: A shield bearing the royal crest lies here.

52.name: a treasure chest
52.room_desc: A heavy iron chest sits here.
